description:
With a history that dates back to 1985, Klein, Daday, Aretos & O'Donoghue, LLC, has served the greater Chicagoland region for more than 30 years. During that time, we have become one of the most respected full-service legal practices in the area, and through our success helping our clients with virtually any legal matter they may face, we have grown to include five total law offices in the region.

A general-practice litigation and transactional law firm, we provide exceptional advocacy, counsel and support for all of the serious and complex legal issues affecting your life, your family, your business and your future. From criminal defense and divorce to banking and finance and other business-related needs to estate planning, bankruptcy, real estate law and more, no matter is beyond our scope, and we also offer effective appellate representation to help you challenge a previous ruling regarding your case.

The dedicated attorneys at our law firm adhere to a mission to always focus on the needs and goals of those we serve. By leveraging our strengths, we can help our clients achieve the favorable outcomes they seek as efficiently and cost-effectively as possible, and we promise to remain accessible throughout all legal proceedings to address your questions and concerns as they arise and to provide regular updates as to the status of your case.

Integrity, professionalism and responsiveness are the hallmarks of our practice, and we employ these principles in everything we do. Regardless of the legal matter you need to address, you can contact Klein, Daday, Aretos & O'Donoghue, LLC, and schedule an appointment with one of our law firm's dedicated attorneys for a consultation.

We are a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the Bankruptcy Code.
